alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 8:59AM AKST until February 02 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional 1 to 3 inches of snow expected. * WHERE...Haines and Haines Highway. * WHEN...From 6 PM Tuesday to 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As of 8 AM AKST, around 5 to 9 inches of snow has been reported in Haines and along the Haines Highway. Light snowfall will continue through the day and possibly transition to a period of freezing drizzle at times. Additional heavy snow is in the forecast Thursday night through Friday, if this trend in the forecast continues additional winter weather hazards may be needed.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
